ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash package¶

Submodules¶

ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_job_config module¶

class ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_job_config.BashJobConfig(job_name: Optional[str] = None, properties: Optional[Dict[str, ai_flow.util.json_utils.Jsonable]] = None)[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.workflow.job_config.JobConfig

BashJobConfig is the configuration of the bash job. It has a configuration item env, which represents the environment variables of the bash job. Example:

job_name:

job_type: bash properties:

env:

a: a b: b

Parameters

  • job_name – Name of the configured job.

  • job_type – The job type of the job, such as bash python etc..

  • properties – Properties of the configured job.

property env¶

ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_job_plugin module¶

class ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_job_plugin.BashJob(job_config: ai_flow.workflow.job_config.JobConfig)[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.workflow.job.Job

BashJob is the description of bash type job. The processors_file field stores the serialized file of the BashProcessor (ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_processor.BashProcessor).

Parameters

job_config – Job configuration information(ai_flow.workflow.job_config.JobConfig).

class ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_job_plugin.BashJobController[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobController

cleanup_job(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv)[source]¶

Clean up temporary resources created during this execution. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution.

get_job_status(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle) → ai_flow.workflow.status.Status[source]¶

Return the job status.

get_result(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, blocking: bool = True) → object[source]¶

Return the job result. :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution. :param blocking: blocking is true: Wait for the job to finish and return the result of the job.

blocking is false: If the job is running, return None.

If the job is finish, return the result of job.

stop_job(job_handle: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle, job_runtime_env: Optional[ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv] = None)[source]¶

Stop a ai flow job. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job_handle: The job handle that contains the necessary information for an execution.

submit_job(job: ai_flow.workflow.job.Job, job_runtime_env: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv) → ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle[source]¶

Submit an executable job to run. :param job_runtime_env: The job runtime environment. Type: ai_flow.runtime.job_runtime_env.JobRuntimeEnv :param job: A job object that contains the necessary information for an execution. :return job_handle: a job handle that maintain the handler of a job runtime.

submit_one_process(processor: ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_processor.BashProcessor, env, working_dir)[source]¶
class ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_job_plugin.BashJobGenerator[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.translator.translator.JobGenerator

generate(sub_graph: ai_flow.ai_graph.ai_graph.AISubGraph, resource_dir: Optional[str] = None) → ai_flow.workflow.job.Job[source]¶

Convert AISubGraph(ai_flow.ai_graph.ai_graph.AISubGraph) to Job(ai_flow.workflow.job.Job) :param sub_graph: An executable Graph composed of AINode and data edges with the same job configuration. :param resource_dir: Store the executable files generated during the generation process. :return: Job(ai_flow.workflow.job.Job)

class ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_job_plugin.BashJobHandle(job: ai_flow.workflow.job.Job, job_execution: ai_flow.plugin_interface.scheduler_interface.JobExecutionInfo)[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface.JobHandle

processors_file¶

It saves the result dict of the bash child process.

sub_process¶

It represents the serialized file of the processor.

ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_processor module¶

class ai_flow_plugins.job_plugins.bash.bash_processor.BashProcessor(bash_command: str, output_encoding: str = 'utf-8')[source]¶

Bases: object

BashProcessor is the processor corresponding to the bash job.

Parameters

  • bash_command – The command of the bash job.

  • output_encoding – The bash job output encoding type.
